attributes.action: request or put pressure on the board of the WRU to resign following the World Cup 2007
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Following repeated failures, financial mis-management, inept appointments, and failures in major competitions in recent years, it is time the board of the WRU resigned and allowed a more representative group of people make decisions about Welsh rugby

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
